title: Feature-Request: Tabs: show folder/path for connections with duplicate names
author: justin-oestmann
body_snippet:
Hey

When I open two connections that have the same display name but are stored in different folders, the tab titles are identical. This makes it impossible to tell which tab belongs to which folder.

Example:

Folder A → Linux.11

Folder B → Linux.11

Opened at the same time, both tabs show only Linux.11

Request
Add an option in Settings to include the folder (or full folder path) in the tab title. For example:

Linux.11 — Folder A

Linux.11 — Folder B

or 

Linux.11 / Folder A

Linux.11 / Fol...
